content: comfort cowl 2019 by petra breakstone comfort cowl as the name says it all this cowl is a comfy one an easy knit too and of course the yarns do play a big role this version is knitted top down from a yarnz2go kit you can knit it from your stash yarn too worked in the round with simple eyelet increases and a bottom edge worked with contrasting colors held together in a stretchy bind off a great project for knitters of all skill levels and a great way to use up some of your stash yarn one size fits most though can be made larger with an extra increase round see the optional section following part 3 for guidance of course more yarn will be needed measurements of small size shown unblocked length 14 5 neck circumference 24 bottom edge circumference 45 yarn abbreviations 1 -
